title: 175. Q&AF: Treating Yo Self, #LIVEHARD & Employees Fucking Up
itunes:title: 175. Q&AF: Treating Yo Self, #LIVEHARD & Employees Fucking Up
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your question about paying yourself versus reinvesting in your business, what to do the rest of the year during the #LIVEHARD program and how to respond when a loyal employee makes a costly mistake.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy answers your question about paying yourself versus reinvesting in your business, what to do the rest of the year during the #LIVEHARD program and how to respond when a loyal employee makes a costly mistake.
